title: Emerging Stocks Hover Near Record, Currencies Gain Before Jobs
description: Emerging-market stocks hovered near record highs as concerns over artificial-intelligence spending receded, while currencies edged up in volatile trading ahead of a key jobs report.
content: Emerging-market stocks hovered near record highs as concerns over artificial-intelligence spending receded, while currencies edged up in volatile trading ahead of a key jobs report.
